structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: If the certification of a fire sprinkler inspector is revoked for any reason, the inspector may, at the conclusion of the revocation period, reapply for a sprinkler system inspector's certification.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 38, effective July 1, 2011.
